attributes.action: Publish the daily total of vaccinations carried out in the previous 24 hours!
attributes.additional_details:
They aim to complete these groups by mid- February 2021.
In order for the public to have faith in the way the vaccinations are being carried out, we call upon the Government to publish the exact daily figures for all vaccinations carried out in the previous 24 hours.
The Government must be open and transparent about the way the vaccinations are carried out and data published.
attributes.background:
With the introduction of another Covid19 lockdown, we call upon the Government to be completely transparent with the way the vaccinations data is published.
The Government has set itself an ambitious target regarding vaccinations of the most vulnerable groups.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564526
